update tb_motorista set motorista_ativo = 'S' where MOTORISTA_CADASTRO IN (12345678912,12345678913,12345678914,12345678915,12345678916,12345678917,12345678918,12345678919,12345678920,12345678921,12345678922,12345678923,12345678924,12345678925,12345678926,12345678927,12345678928,12345678929,12345678930,12345678931,12345678932,12345678933,12345678934,12345678935,12345678936,12345678937,12345678938,12345678939)
